TextAsset.value: Alright, I’ll bite.
What’s up?
It’s just so, like, unfair…
There’s a REALLY great sale going on at the mall today!
I really wanted to go, but I’ve got DETENTION, ugh…
It’s today only and there’s SUCH great deals and I’m MISSING it!
My life is like, over….
Are you serious? That’s all this is about?
Just because it’s not important to you, doesn’t mean it can’t be important to me!
I wouldn’t make fun of you if there was like, a discount on rolling up stuff you were missing.
(That doesn’t really make sense, but I guess I see her point.)
… Okay, okay…
How can I help?
Oh, ${slot:playerName}!
I knew you’d want to help me!
It’s because I’m so cute and personable.
Everyone in Namco High wants to help me!
That just makes it sound like you could’ve asked ANYONE, and left me out of this!
Tee-hee! Oh, hush.
Okay, here’s the plan…
You lift me up to the window. I’m too small to reach without you!
Then I can sneak out…
Too bad there’s nothing to per-cushion me if I fall.
(...I can’t take much more of this…)
Once I’m out, I can totally go check out the sale, no problem!
Uh, maybe I’m missing something, but…
How the heck are we gonna do this without anyone noticing?
Just do it already!
(Well, I guess I’m in it now.
Here goes nothing…
Huh! Donko is surprisingly light. I have no trouble lifting her up to the window.
But wait… as she’s going through the window… She’s still grabbing my hands…
I’m being pulled through, too!
AAAAHHHHHH….)
Yay, we’re out! See? Easy as do-re-mi.
Donko!
Did you do that on purpose!
Of course I did, honey!
I sneak out of detention on my own all the time. I just wanted you to come with me!
How could I let you miss out on such an amazing sale!
Especially since it’s the perfect place to get you a new outfit…
Which will help you get TOTALLY POPULAR!
Sigh. I guess now that I’ve already snuck out of school, I have no choice...
...Besides…
It’s sorta flattering that Donko would go so far…
For my sake.)
Ahh, we made it to the mall!
See? That was cymbal enough!
Now let’s drum up some cute outfits!
Please, Donko…
Enough with the drum puns already!
They’re starting to get a little labored.
Huh?
What do you mean?!
(Does she really not notice that she's saying those things?!)
${slot:playerName}, what did I tell you about being weird?
Um, don’t be it?
Ta-don! That’s right!
See, honey? You’re learning about popularity already.
But the first step towards popularity is looking your best!
Isn’t that kinda shallow?
What?! Of course not!
How you dress is like, a total expression of what’s inside you!
Like your personality, and stuff you like, and whatever.
If you don’t take the effort to show that stuff to the world with how you dress…
That means you don’t care about what’s inside!
And that’s terrible!
(I’m not sure I totally agree with what Donko is saying, but…
She’s obviously not just some airhead.
...Although… she might literally be full of air...
Anyway, this seems to really be important to her.)
Now, let’s see! What would like nice on you…
Hats are in this year!
But I don’t see any that would fit on your big weird head…
Speak for yourself!
Hmm, this is harder than I thought.
What do you think, honey?
What’s, like, inside you that you want to express?
Interesting!
I wouldn’t have guessed that’s how you see yourself.
Oh! Oh! I know!
OMG, this is like, totally PERFECT!
${slot:playerName}, please, you’ve GOT to try on this amazing scarf!
(Whoah, Donko’s just throwing that scarf around my neck, without waiting for an answer.)
H-hey now… I’m not sure I need….
Oh, WOW….
${slot:playerName}…
You look so, so GOOD in this!
It totally brings out your pretty eyes!
I almost can’t even believe it!
It’s a whole new YOU!
I, uh… Um…
(I was going to say something, but…
The way Donko is looking at me in this scarf…
It makes me feel…
Really good.)
Sorry, I totally spaced!
You were going to say something about how you’re “not sure you need...”?
Uh-
Nevermind.
Teehee.
I thought so.
...Y’know, honey…
Now that I’ve picked out something cute for YOU to wear…
It’s only fair if you get to pick out something you’d like to see ME in.
Huh? What do you have in mind?
It’s no fun if I tell you what to pick! Anything you want, honey!
Honestly, Donko…
I think you’re the cutest wearing nothing at all!
(AUGH! SHE SLAPPED ME IN THE FACE!
What’d I say?!)
Hee hee hee!
You get right to the point, don’t you~?
(Whaa?! She slapped me, and now she’s giggling?
And what does she mean, “get right to the…”
OH MY GOD…
SHE THOUGHT I MEANT….
OH NO, NO!
I DIDN’T MEAN IT LIKE THAT...
I MEAN, I THOUGHT DONKO DOESN’T WEAR ANYTHING ANYWAY…
I MEAN…SHE’S A DRUM, SO… WHAT’S... CLOTHES...
OH NOOOOOOOO!)
Tee hee hee! Don’t get any ideas, honey!
I’m not that kind of drum!
I…
I didn’t…
(Wait, so…
IS Donko wearing clothes now?
Which part is the clothes?
Is it wrapped around her body…?
AUGH! What am I saying!
I’ve gotta stop thinking about this!
I’m so embarrassed...)
I guess I don’t really need to get anything today.
You can’t mess with perfect style like mine.
(Thank goodness she changed the subject.)
But you, ${slot:playerName}!
PLEASE tell me you’re getting that scarf.
You like, SO need the fashion boost.
You know what, don’t EVEN say another word.
I’m totally getting you that scarf.
It’d be, like, a fashion crime to let you walk out of here without it.
Wh-what!
Donko, no… I can’t ask you to do that for me.
Tee-hee! You’re not asking me, honey!
I, like, insist.
After all, I did sorta kinda force you to sneak out of detention with me…
I totally owe you one.
(Normally, I’d protest more, but…
That’s kind of a good point.
Besides, if I can keep wearing this scarf, and it makes Donko look at me like that…
I can’t really complain about that.)
Oh, yikes.
We’d better be getting back to school soon…
I’ll go ring this up, honey!
Th-Thanks.
Thanks for your purchase! Have a great day!
And don’t forget to come back over the weekend!
Our sale is going on until Monday!
Cool! Thanks!
Haha! That was actually pretty fun…
Thanks again, Donko.
Just you wait, honey- with that scarf, people will start to notice you!
It expresses your, like, totally earnest, sensitive side…
And to top it all off, it was on sale- 50% off! Score!
Haha, gosh… Earnest and sensitive…
Hey, wait a minute.
You said…
About the sale…
Did you… lie to me?
Hmm? Well, maybe it was more like 49% off…
I rounded up! So sue me!
Don’t be such, like, a math geek.
No, I mean…
You told me the sale was only happening today.
You were almost crying, saying you were going to miss it…
But the cashier said… She said the sale was going on until Monday.
That means you’d have the whole weekend to shop…
You lied to me… to get me to help you to sneak out.
Mmm…
SIGH. Yes, that’s totally true.
You’re just admitting it?
No reason to deny it…
I like, REALLY wanted you to shop with me.
I kinda thought it was the only way to get you to come…
Sorry.
That really sucks, Donko...
But at least you’re being honest with me now…
And… you did buy me a nice scarf… without getting anything for yourself.
Plus, it’s all to make you super popular!
You’ll thank me when all is said and done.
Haha… I guess-
What’s going on here?!
Why aren’t you two in detention?
Ahhh! Principal Dig Dug!
Hee hee, oops!
WELL?!
Donko… can I talk to you privately for a moment?
You said you sneak out all the time…
Don’t you have a plan for not getting caught, or something?!
Uh, like, where’d you get that idea?
I do sneak out all the time…
I just always get caught, silly!
W h a t
Getting in trouble is like, no big deal!
I’ll flash em my cutest puppy-dog eyes and we’ll be off the hook.
LOL! It’s easy!
(...I can’t believe this...
Donko really thinks she can get away with anything, just because she’s cute.
I might’ve been okay with the lying…
But this kind of thing makes me angry…)
What?
Oh come on! Don’t give me that look.
What’s the point of being so charming if you don’t use it?
I wish she’d just shut up already…)
Alright, that’s enough jabbering amongst yourselves!
My office! NOW!
(That day…
Principal Dig Dug was even angrier than he was the day I rolled up the school.
And the worst part is, it’s all Donko’s fault I’m in trouble again.
I don’t care about being popular, but I liked the excuse to spend time with her.
But is she really being nice? Is she only pretending to help me?
Does she know I’ll be charmed by her cuteness, and I’ll just do whatever she wants?
After all, Dig Dug said he was going to give us “double detention” for sneaking out, but Donko flashed a cute smile, and it seems like we got off pretty easy…
Donko… do you really care, or what?
I guess she did buy me this scarf…
I don’t know if I even want to wear it now.
But the memory of buying it with her is still a good one…
I just wish I knew if it was real.)
